input.context_nl: There are two kinds of agricultural products A and B. A cannot grow in dry climate and B cannot grow in cold climate. In most parts of a country, either agricultural product Aor agricultural product B can be planted.
input.question_nl: If the above statement is true, then half of the country having a dry and cold climate must be false.
input.label: entailment

translation.contextDsl:
hasProperty There b
rel ?x a CannotGrowInDryClimateAndBCannotGrowInColdClimate
rel ?x in MostPartsOfACountry,EitherAgriculturalProductAorAgriculturalProductBCanBePlanted
